name: Clojure
description: Clojure is a dynamic functional language from the Lisp family that runs on many different platforms

resources.name: Clojure For The Brave And True
pros: Complete guide through most of the language
Assumes no prior knowledge of functional programming or Lisp

resources.name: Functions Explained Through Patterns
pros: Visual explanations of core Clojure functions

resources.name: 4clojure
cons: No tutorial from the ground up

resources.name: Clojure by Example
cons: No thorough explanations for complete programming beginners

resources.name: Clojure for Java Programmers
cons: Mostly aimed at people from an OOP background

resources.name: Clojure API Cheatsheet
pros: Overview over almost the entire standard library

resources.name: Clojure beginner resources
pros: Collection of all kinds of resources to learn Clojure
